name: Time in SF
description:
When a time traveler, from the future, mysteriously lands in modern day San Francisco, he has to find a way back. On his  journey, his meet the strange and unique people that inhabit this city. Can you get back home?

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
Space Bar to jump
X key for dialogue

Created by Sally Hong, 2021

This semester in Game Code Design students worked on portraying themes of mental wellbeing and exploration by developing a simple 2D side scroller game set in San Francisco. As their player will move through the city, they’ll stop to engage in playful dialogue with other characters.
